verbs.description: From a triumphant state dinner to a [V: shared] [ARG1: smile] with Barack Obama , the quiet Melania Trump made a lot of noise this week .
[ARGM-ADV: From a triumphant state dinner to a shared smile with Barack Obama] , [ARG0: the quiet Melania Trump] [V: made] [ARG1: a lot of noise] [ARGM-TMP: this week] .
